name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Free Access
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Free Access
description:
Experience the next generation of Multiplayer with Black Ops Cold War Free Access, from December 17th to December 24th. Bring an arsenal of weapons and equipment into the depths of the Cold War's volatile geopolitical battle of the early 1980s.

The iconic Black Ops series is back with Call of Duty®: Black Ops Cold War - the direct sequel to the original and fan-favorite Call of Duty®: Black Ops.

Welcome to the brink. Welcome to Black Ops Cold War.
